name: Space Island
overview: There is a dangerous time distortion around the planet Zyro. Your starship is locked into geostationary orbit above Roba, a volcanic island on Zyro. Repeated attempts to land a survey unit have fallen to laser attacks from the surface. One android has survived a crash and awaits your command. He stands alone amid the wreckage on a small island west of Roba. He is your only hope of completing your mission. You must watch him on your video-scanner and direct his actions. Be sure to think quickly - this is a real-time adventure.
